name: Too Close to the Sun
description:
On a planet too close to the Sun, man's best friend finds a way to be helpful.
Your doggy space suit can withstand the temperatures up to a point, direct sunlight is too dangerous!
Find your human friend to win.
Controls: A/D movement, W/space Jump, S crouch, E/lmb interact.
